tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE privacy_impact_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_processing_activity TEXT,
    data_subject_type TEXT,
    data_impact_level INT,
    assessment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE individual_privacy (
    individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    data_accessed VARCHAR(255)
);
